name: Homestuck Strife Project
description:
Strife Project is an ongoing fanmade fighting game based on the Homestuck universe, stylized to be reminiscent of the comic's early "STRIFE" animations. The first beta release is currently playable, featuring two characters!

FEATURES

  • A large roster of fan-favorite playable characters from the Homestuck universe! The game will be updated with more as time goes on!
  • Stages featuring many iconic Homestuck locations, accompanied by an all-new soundtrack by PotatoBoss!
  • Flashy attacks and specials for every character!

WHAT'S IN BETA v1?

  • Two characters: Dave Strider, Rose Lalonde
  • Two stages: Strider Rooftop, Lalonde Manor
  • Tag-team mode

CREDITS
